text: Alberto Regazzoni (born 4 May 1983) is a footballer from Switzerland who currently plays as left winger for AC Sementina.Alberto Regazzoni non molla, giocherà nel Sementina‚ sportmomo.ch, 8 January 2018 He has also played for the Swiss national squad. He started his career at FC Lugano, after the club faced bankruptcy near the end of 2002–03 season, he transferred to FC Malcantone Agno. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss footballers Category:Switzerland international footballers Category:BSC Young Boys players Category:FC Sion players Category:FC Lugano players Category:FC Chiasso players Category:Swiss Super League players Category:People from Lugano Category:Association football wingers Category:Association football forwards
title: Alberto Regazzoni
